data.meta_description: [Free E-book] Looking to build up your resiliency against ransomware? Download our 10 cybersecurity best practices that ransomware fears most.
data.text:
Our Xvantage Sales Pitch Olympics champion, Jessica Syracuse, said it best: Xvantage is revolutionizing B2B with a B2C experience. Just like your favorite online shopping platforms, Xvantage uses AI to deliver personalized recommendations. Learn how you can customize your homepage with drag-and-drop widgets and free up time for your business: https://ow.ly/f8zS50T5pjW

We're excited to announce the go-live of our new photovoltaic (PV) system - which converts sunlight into electrical energy - in Staubing, Germany! We use 65% of the electricity produced, with the rest feeding the public grid. This investment underscores our commitment to sustainability and environmental protection. Join us on our ESG journey! Visit our careers site to learn more and explore opportunities: https://lnkd.in/gbqfv4AR #ingrammicro #shapetomorrowingrammicro #IngramMicroESG

The CRN Channel Awards 2024 shortlist has been released and we're finalists in THREE categories! Ingram Micro has been shortlisted for AI Driven/Powered Project of the Year and Cloud Distributor of the Year and Comms-care has been nominated for Channel Services Provider of the Year! Take a look at the full list here: https://lnkd.in/eT9vP-zP Thank you to CRN UK and congratulations to all the other finalists, we're keeping our fingers crossed for the awards night on the 14th November ü§û

Ingram Micro Mexico takes action! We‚Äôre proud to share our significant reforestation efforts in Sierra de Guadalupe, an area previously impacted by wildfires and pests. Our initiative is not only restoring local biodiversity but also strengthening the ecosystem‚Äôs resilience. Want to be part of our mission for a healthier environment? Visit our careers website: https://lnkd.in/gbqfv4AR #IngramMicro #Shapetomorrowingrammicro #IngramMicroESG

This year‚Äôs ‚ÄòI am safe day‚Äô at our logistics center in Straubing, Germany, was a resounding success. With the motto ‚ÄúFair Play ‚Äì Safe Work‚Äù, we focused on practical training and team competition to identify potential hazards in the workplace. Interested in being part of our safety-conscious team? Visit our careers site to explore opportunities with us, https://lnkd.in/gbqfv4AR #ingrammicro #shapetomorrowingrammicro

Meet Rafael Marangoni our Executive Director for Cloud Services. Rafael shares insights about our dynamic team and the exciting work we do. Are you ready to elevate your career in the cloud? Don't miss the opportunity to be a part of our global team. Visit our careers site: #ingrammicro #shapetomorrowingrammicro
